examples.full_description: Activity relationships can access the associated signups
Activity relationships can access the associated campers
Signup relationships can access the associated camper
Signup relationships can access the associated activity

examples.description: must have a time between 0 and 23
examples.full_description: Signup validations must have a time between 0 and 23

examples.description: returns an array of all activities
examples.full_description: Activities GET /activities returns an array of all activities
Activities GET /activities returns a status of 200 (OK)
Activities DELETE /activities/:id with a valid ID deletes the Activity
Activities DELETE /activities/:id with a valid ID deletes the associated Signups
Activities DELETE /activities/:id with an invalid ID returns an error message

examples.description: returns the appropriate HTTP status code
examples.full_description: Activities DELETE /activities/:id with an invalid ID returns the appropriate HTTP status code

examples.description: returns an array of all campers
examples.full_description: Campers GET /campers returns an array of all campers

examples.description: does not return any nested activities
examples.full_description: Campers GET /campers does not return any nested activities
Campers GET /campers returns a status of 200 (OK)

examples.description: returns the matching camper with their associated activities
examples.full_description: Campers GET /campers/:id with a valid ID returns the matching camper with their associated activities
Campers GET /campers/:id with a valid ID returns a status of 200 (OK)
Campers GET /campers/:id with an invalid ID returns an error message

examples.description: returns the appropriate HTTP status code
examples.full_description: Campers GET /campers/:id with an invalid ID returns the appropriate HTTP status code
Campers POST /campers with valid data creates a new Camper
Campers POST /campers with valid data returns the associated Camper data
Campers POST /campers with valid data returns a status code of 201 (created)

examples.description: does not create a new Camper
examples.full_description: Campers POST /campers with invalid data does not create a new Camper
Campers POST /campers with invalid data returns the error messages

examples.description: returns a status code of 422 (Unprocessable Entity)
examples.full_description: Campers POST /campers with invalid data returns a status code of 422 (Unprocessable Entity)

examples.description: does not define unnecessary campers routes
examples.full_description: UnnecessaryRoutes does not define unnecessary campers routes

examples.description: does not define unnecessary activities routes
examples.full_description: UnnecessaryRoutes does not define unnecessary activities routes

examples.description: does not define unnecessary signups routes
examples.full_description: UnnecessaryRoutes does not define unnecessary signups routes
